name: supranational
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving more than one country, or having power or authority that is greater than that of single countries: NATO is a supranational organization.

POLITICS, GOVERNMENT involving more than one country: the WTO, and other supranational organizations A large percentage of the fund's assets will be invested in securities of supranational entities.
